package.name: orca

scratch.help: directory to use for temp files of package

ecp.help: Pseudo potential to use, Delete if you do not want to use ecps

options.help: additional options that should be written to input file

package.options:
! DFT B3LYP Grid7 DIRECT TightSCF PAL4 ! D3BJ
!SmallPrint %output Print[ P_MOs ] 1 end

cleanup.help: files to delete identified by fileending
